name: Space Explorer
description:
Explore the space and save the universe from Mercadona and its minions. Fight against a lot of enemies like Disney or Radioactivity.

Have you ever wanted to save the universe and fight against Mercadona and a hole lot of other enemies like a real heroe? Well, you can do it now. You are welcome. 

In this game you will become a Space Explorer and you'll travel around diferent world fighting those who want to rule the world by all means without takin care of its habitants. 

This is your opportunity to become the hero and the astronaut you always wanted to be!

How to play:

Player 1 : AWSD to move & Ctrl to shoot

Player 2: Arrows to move & Alt to shoot

A class project by Eva Agramunt and Alba Roncero.

CEV Barcelona.

 infringement intended.
